name: Bob Kilroy
text:
This is a very small place. There isn't much room at the counter, but the dining area is decent enough for a small birthday party.
The staff are very friendly and helpful and the service is quick. A good place for take out.

name: D Platt
text: Great pizza and food. The one thing you have to be careful about is double checking your order to make sure it’s accurate... especially if you made any requests like toasted bun or no onions on a sub. We have even received a sub without …More

name: Cat L
text: Solid Papa Gino experience. This location has been open for ages and still serves up great pizza. Nice mural in the back dining room;

name: Dee T.
text: The staff here are super nice, and always responsive to wait times and the perfection of the pizza they serve. The mamangement greet many of their customers by name...  5 stars +!

name: Grace Petrie
text: The female manager is a lot more rude then the old manager, but the food is good as always.  We have ordered delivery and ate in a few times and I'd have to saw I love the meat pizza and fries!  I just wish the new manager gave us time to figure what we want to eat instead of rushing us at the register

name: Victoria M
text: Offers decent pizza certainly better than Dominos but not the best. Delivery is very slow frequently taking 15-30 minutes longer than quoted. However, the biggest ding is their dining area it's dark and filthy I would recommend getting it to-go.

name: bud parker
text: Usually one of the best in chain, but last visit our meatballs were still frozen in the center, and even the pasta itself was only lukewarm.  Having no confidence in the current staff that night, we just sucked it up and we will hope for better next time.  Wednesday evening 5-23-18

name: Lilian Turp
text: Food is good as any other papas around but it takes so long to get what you ordered from delivery. Ive ordered delivery like 3 times and they always say it will be here in 30 minutes but it takes over an hour, one time even two hours. The staff are so rude when you ask why it took long.  ...just go to the one in STOW

name: Dale Richardson
text: The pocket sandwiches are absolutely delicious.  The pasta isn't bad either, the cheese ravioli being particularly good.  The pizza is horrible.  But if you're not there for pizza it's pretty good at a fair price.

name: Ave Metell
text: One of the best papa Gino's around, I prefer eat in tho.only did to go once and my pizza was kinda dry. Not the staffs fault tho. Also other then pizza, I highly recommend the fried ravioli and  salads YUM

name: Derril Mcdonald
text: Best pizza. All the other fast food style joints are garbage compared.

name: Norm K
text: Papa Gino's makes the best pizza. Tasty, crispy, not too thick, not too thin. Perfect!

name: Gary N.
text: Good for pickup. a little slow on ordering in. Very pleasant staff

name: Gregory Jesanis
text: Service has been overwhelmingly slow every time i have been here, with 1hr waits for small pizzas and the people working here have no idea what is going on.  They messed up my order twice and 5 other peoples tonight alone.  Better places in Concord and Acton, dont bother with these guys

name: Kyle Montigny
text: Good pizza. you can go in and sit down.

name: Jenna Scott
text: There food is amazing and fresh.  They have great staff.

name: 617 J.
text: Place is old & filthy. Pizza had way too much oil,super greasy , and the xl pizza was smaller than other papa ginos I’ve been to. No wonder the place was empty on a Sunday afternoon.

name: Kevin Wheeler
text: papa gino's in acton is AWESOME I order all the time and it is always very consistent, and quick delivery

name: Philippe Michaud
text: Very good pizza like every other Papa Gino's. Good price, good food and excellent staff.

name: Factor
text: Took them 3 hours to deliver a pizza and a salad 2.1 miles.  Send in the clowns.

name: Tucker Pelletier
text: I live in Acton, and I'm outside there delivery zone.

name: Dana Kagno
text: Reliable pizza

name: Brandon Simas
text: I really like the gf pizza

name: DENISE WHITNEY
text: They make breadsticks for me w/o the cheese!!

name: Roacha
text: Pizza came late on two separate occasions, just delivered the wrong pizza to us, would no recommend

name: KR
text: Ordering to pickup it was a disaster. Our order was not together and good was cold. 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡

name: Nickie McNeil
text: over it

name: eddy Who
text: Incompetent and rude staff in a filthy environment.  Avoid.

name: Debby Jean Shuris
text: Great food and ppl

name: Eric Navarrete
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent meal

(Original)
Excelente comida

name: Melissa Meadows
text:
